overview: Get ready for a strong dose of progressive metal! This Swedish quintet offers their trademark powerful and sublime compositions that are both structurally intricate and overflowing with a vast spectrum of emotions.  1.	Periscope 2.	Mirages 3.	In the Deepest of Waters  4.	Two Is One 5.	The Hidden Riddle 6.	Chameleon Carneval 7.	Inner Circle 8.	Eclipse  9.	In the End 10.	Encyclopedia 11.	Reaching Deep Within 12.	The Words Unspoken
title: Andromeda: Playing Off the Board
